mainBoard.originalText: Red spells and white spells you play cost o1 less to play.

rulings.text: If a spell is both red and white, you pay {1} less, not {2} less.

The generic X cost is still considered generic even if there is a requirement that a specific color be used for it. For example, “only black mana can be spent this way”. This distinction is important for effects which reduce the generic portion of a spell’s cost.
This can lower the cost to zero, but not below zero.
The effect is cumulative.
The lower cost is not optional like with some other cost reducers.
Can never affect the colored part of the cost.
If this card is sacrificed to pay part of a spell’s cost, the cost reduction still applies.

foreignData.name: Sengende Lava
foreignData.text:
Bonus {R} (Du kannst zusätzlich {R} bezahlen, wenn Du diesen Zauberspruch spielst.)
Sengende Lava fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu. Wenn Du die Bonuskosten bezahlt hast, kann diese Kreatur in diesem Zug nicht regeneriert werden, und wenn sie in diesem Zug auf den Friedhof gelegt würde, entferne sie stattdessen ganz aus dem Spiel.

foreignData.name: Lave dévastatrice
foreignData.text:
Kick {R} (Vous pouvez payer {R} supplémentaires quand vous jouez ce sort.)
La Lave dévastatrice inflige 2 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur. Si vous avez payé le coût de kick, cette créature ne peut pas être régénérée ce tour-ci et si elle devait être mise dans un cimetière ce tour-ci, retirez-la de la partie à la place.

mainBoard.name: Scorching Lava
mainBoard.originalText:
Kicker oR (You may pay an additional oR as you play this spell.)
Scorching Lava deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If you paid the kicker cost, that creature can't be regenerated this turn and if it would be put into a graveyard this turn, remove it from the game instead.
mainBoard.text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Scorching Lava deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, that creature can't be regenerated this turn and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

foreignData.text: Le Simoun inflige 1 blessure à chaque créature que l'adversaire ciblé contrôle.

mainBoard.name: Simoon
mainBoard.originalText: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.
mainBoard.text: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

foreignData.flavorText: Verbranntes Fleisch, geschwärzte Seele.
foreignData.name: Versengung
foreignData.text: Versengung fügt einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu. Die Farbe dieser Kreatur wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu Schwarz.

foreignData.flavorText: Chair brûlée. Âme noircie.
foreignData.name: Roussissement
foreignData.text: Le Roussissement inflige 1 blessure à la créature ciblée. Cette créature devient noire jusqu'à la fin du tour.

mainBoard.name: Singe
mainBoard.originalText: Singe deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature becomes black until end of turn.
mainBoard.text: Singe deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature becomes black until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: To save Dominaria, nine planeswalkers sought the annihilation of Phyrexia itself.

foreignData.flavorText: Um Dominaria zu retten, dachten neun Weltenwanderer daran, Phyrexia selber zu vernichten.
foreignData.name: Implodieren
foreignData.text:
Zerstöre ein Land Deiner Wahl.
Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Pour sauver Dominaria, neuf Arpenteurs pensèrent même à détruire Phyrexia.
foreignData.name: Implosion
foreignData.text:
Détruisez le terrain ciblé.
Piochez une carte.

mainBoard.name: Implode
mainBoard.originalText:
Destroy target land.
Draw a card.
mainBoard.text:
